author: simon_brown
post: Thanks Dave, I received your last article. I will add it on your first article, and send it out this weekend. There is an interesting article below for you to read. I hope you are getting better. As Jesus and I need you. Simon Brown. Http://wwwrealdiscoveriesorg simon.blogspot.co.uk/ For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life. John 3:16 King James Version (KJV).
